GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
DNC 01.
M/V REPORTS APPROACH BY TWO SUSPICIOUS VESSELS IN
04-02N 006-00E AT 262300Z NOV. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO
KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME
CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
